data.rationale:
This module is convenient to convert "♥" (named HTML
    entities) to "♥" (decimal HTML entities reference) or
    "♥" (hexadecimal HTML entities reference).

    HTML::Entities also works similar as above
    (HTML::Entities::encode_numeric(decode_entities($content)); # ->
    "â™¥"). But, it will be convert excessive characters.
    HTML::Entities::Numbered just works exactly.

    This is also useful for making XML (corrects the undefined HTML
    entity references).
